item.description: Learn how utilizing the API can help automate even more of your Revit process, or how it can help you better manage and present the "i" in BIM. Jason Grant from Payette and Michael Coviello from TRO JungBrannen are teaming up to represent their AU session, giving examples of how the API is being used in their offices. They'll exhibit code from a simple API to describe a basic code understanding and provide useful resources to help you manipulate the API. If you are looking to have more control over the functions and data within Revit (and really...who isn't!?), come to this meeting!
item.name: AU Session: Revit API Examples from Real Office Applications
